attributes.action: London 2011 Rioters should be made to pay damages !
attributes.additional_details:
All the people involved and convicted for being involved with the London, Birmingham etc.. should be made to pay for some of the damages caused by them, and should be involved in the clean up, as part of there sentences etc.
They are complaining about a persons life, that was taken away, when they are endangering hundreds if not thousands of life's and should be made to pay and help ! They also should not get benifits
